author: schone_wizard
content: since client diversity is again a hot buzzer issue and topic of conversation, i'd like to yet again raise what i said before.  there needs to be a standard for metrics generated by the beacon chain and validator servies.  this is one of the biggest hangups for anybody having one monitoring of their system to adopting another client

author: schone_wizard
content: it requires a rough change of whatever monitoring you're using and it makes moving between clients anything but seamless

author: schone_wizard
content: if your alerts in say grafana are based on certain keys that work in prysm, and lighthouse doesn't even produce anything close to those keys, you're basically shit out of luck to use both clients 50%/50% without some extra headache on your end to figure out how to adapt your alerting
